title: Struct as method ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
```
struct G;
fn main() {
    let g = G();
}
```

results in

```
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc derp.rs
derp.rs:3:13: 3:16 error: expected function, found `G`
derp.rs:3     let g = G();
                      ^~~
derp.rs:3:13: 3:14 error: internal compiler error: unexpected callee type G
derp.rs:3     let g = G();
                      ^
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
```
